content:
I received an announcement of this academic program between Brazil and the Czech Republic. More details at https://www.incbac.org. Does anyone from the Lean community happen to be affiliated with one of the universities listed below? I would be happy to encourage students from my department to apply if we have the opportunity to work on a Lean-related project.

  • Czech Technical University in Prague
  • Charles University in Prague
  • University of Life Sciences in Prague
  • Metropolitan University in Prague
  • Technical University in Brno
  • Masaryk University in Brno
  • Mendel University in Brno
  • University of West Bohemia
  • Technical University in Liberec
  • University of South Bohemia
  • University of Pardubice
  • University of Hradec Králové
  • Palacký University Olomouc
  • Czech Academy of Sciences.
This topic was moved here from #announce > UNIGOU Academic Internships Brazil-Czech by Floris van Doorn.
I moved this to job postings, because that seems to be more appropriate for internships.
I recommend looking around in the #Geographic locality channel, e.g. #Geographic locality > Prague, CZ for find people in specific locations.
